companies.name: Spectrum.Life
companies.description: Ireland-based digital health and wellbeing platform offering clinically-backed EAP services, 24/7 multilingual counselling, virtual primary care, and neurodiversity assessments to over 7.5 million members.

companies.name: YuLife
companies.description: UK-based insurtech platform that combines group life insurance with a gamified employee wellbeing app, rewarding healthy behaviors like walking and mindfulness with redeemable YuCoin rewards.

companies.name: Alan
companies.description: France's first digital health insurance company serving over 1 million members across Europe and Canada, integrating preventive health, mental wellbeing (Alan Mind), and AI-powered care navigation into employer-sponsored coverage.

companies.name: Spill
companies.description: UK's highest-rated modern EAP offering same-day video therapy sessions bookable in 3 clicks via Slack, MS Teams, or web app, with a Safety Net feature that proactively detects employees at mental health risk.

companies.name: Unmind
companies.description: Science-led workplace mental health platform trusted by brands like Uber and Disney, combining AI-powered coaching, therapy access, self-guided content, and organizational wellbeing analytics for over 2.5 million employees.

companies.name: Modern Health
companies.description: Global EAP provider offering a comprehensive mental health platform spanning therapy, coaching, and digital wellbeing assessments with multilingual support and data-driven analytics for enterprise employers.

companies.name: Spring Health
companies.description: AI-driven mental health benefits platform that uses precision matching to connect employees with the right therapist or treatment plan, offering care ranging from self-help resources to clinical therapy and rehab.

companies.name: Lyra Health
companies.description: Evidence-based mental health care platform for employers that delivers fast access to therapists and coaches, with proven outcomes including a 26% reduction in medical claims and 70% productivity improvement.

companies.name: CuraLinc Healthcare
companies.description: Modern EAP provider that combines technology with personalized clinical advocacy to engage, empower, and support employees throughout their mental health care journey.

companies.name: TELUS Health
companies.description: Global wellbeing platform (formerly LifeWorks) offering a comprehensive EAP with round-the-clock counselling, workplace mental health training, and an integrated physical, mental, and financial wellness hub.
